title: Ola Electric announces integration of its 'Made in India' cells in own EVs by Q1 FY26
description: Ola Electric revealed plans to use its newly developed 'Bharat cell' lithium batteries in its electric vehicles by Q1 FY26 and announced the upcoming launch of new electric motorcycles. The company reported a 34.32% rise in revenue and record vehicle deliveries, reaching 1,25,198 units in the recent quarter.
